page.title: 14Hollington Junior School
page.content: It was built in 1974 to replace the old building in Hollington Old Lane. Before,the land was used to graze horses.There is one main building and 8 huts.We have{360 children}in 1985, and{16 teachers.}There are two classes in our area,which is really the dining room.We have small blue tables as desks and locker trays for our books. One side of our area is covered with books shelves,which are full.We are lucky to have a large school field. Sometimes we have our{lessons}in 1 large group.Mostly in the morning,we have Maths,English and Assembly. Afternoon lessons are like Topic, Science,Games and Art.We watch T.V. 3 times a week, often pre-recorded on video.We also use computers,which are new and exciting; and work with calculators in Maths.We have just started learning French (3rd.year).
